main.title: COVID-19 Cough Data Collection Study
main.note: Please note: This form is for data collection only. It will not predict or diagnose any disease, disorder, or other health condition. Virufy is conducting research and will use the information you provide for research. The Virufy app doesn’t replace a doctor. Remember that it is your responsibility to seek medical advice from your doctor.
main.paragraph1: Welcome! This study should only take about 5 minutes to complete.
main.errorCountry: We are unable to collect coughs from your region at this time. Check back with us soon!
main.privacyPolicy: By proceeding you accept the terms of our <1>Privacy Policy
main.servicePurposeText: Virufy is a service that uses artificial intelligence (Al) to analyze voice patterns to determine whether they resemble the coughs of patients suffering from COVID-19. This service is not a medical device, so it only provides information and is not intended for medical advice, diagnosis, treatment, prevention, etc. The Service is not a substitute for a doctor or other medical professional, so please do not make any medical decisions or take or stop any action (such as taking any medication) based on the information we provide. Also, do not use it in life-threatening or emergency situations. This service does not take any responsibility for the disease the user originally suffers from or the consequences of actions taken by the user based on the information provided.
main.terms: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy Please use after agreeing to

helpVirufy.title: About Us
helpVirufy.introParagraph: Welcome to our study! This should only take you about 5 minutes to complete. Before we begin, let’s discuss what we will cover:
helpVirufy.aboutParagraph: <0>Virufy is a robust 501(c)(3) nonprofit research organization developing AI algorithms to identify various respiratory diseases like COVID-19, flu, and TB through analysis of smartphone-recorded forced coughing sounds. Our team comprises 50 partner organizations including Amazon Web Services and One Young World, and 250 volunteers including students and faculty from Stanford, Harvard, and MIT.<0>We are building a mapping system to track and predict the spread of respiratory diseases. Please join us by sharing your cough sounds to help us build a dashboard to support the health of your local community.
helpVirufy.aboutBeforeText: Before we begin, we will give you a 5 minute explanation about us and our research.

consent.title: Consent to the Study
consent.paragraph1: Virufy cares about your privacy and is advised by licensed data privacy experts. The information and recordings you provide will only be used for the purposes described in our <1>privacy policy</1> and <3>consent form</3>. Please read the Consent Form:
consent.paragraph2Title: Virufy Explicit Consent to Collect Personal Information and Participate in Research Form
consent.paragraph2: "Collection of Smartphone Data for Screening of COVID-19"
consent.paragraph3: By checking the below boxes, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the Virufy privacy policy, and that you are providing your explicit consent to Virufy’s collection and processing of the categories of biometric and health information enumerated below.
consent.certifyBrazil: I certify that I am at least 18 years old and agree to the terms of this Consent Form, hereby expressly consenting to the collection and processing of my personal information, biometric information, and health information.
consent.certify: I certify that I am at least 18 years old and agree to the terms of this Consent Form.
consent.agree: I agree to the terms of the Virufy <1>Privacy Policy<1>.
consent.collection: I hereby expressly consent to the collection and processing of my personal information, biometric information, and health information.
consent.collectionColombia: I hereby expressly consent to the collection, processing and transfer of my personal information, biometric information, and health information.
consent.detection: I hereby acknowledge and agree that processing shall be done for the purposes indicated above and, in particular but without limitation, for training artificial intelligence algorithms to analyze cough audio recordings to better determine spread of respiratory disease.
consent.detectionBrazil: I hereby acknowledge and agree that the processing shall be done for the purposes indicated above, and in particular, but without limitation, for the research and compilation of a data set necessary for the development of artificial intelligence algorithms for device-based device-based COVID-19 detection, to train artificial intelligence algorithms to analyze cough audio recordings to better determine COVID-19 signals.
consent.signs: I hereby acknowledge and agree that processing shall be done for the purposes indicated above and, in particular but without limitation, for training artificial intelligence algorithms to analyze cough audio recordings to better determine signs of COVID-19.
consent.biometric: I hereby expressly consent to the sharing of my personal information, biometric information, and health information with third parties as described in this Consent Form and/or the Virufy Privacy Policy.

beforeStart.title: Before we Start...
beforeStart.subtitle: For your security, we recommend:
advise_list: Please use your own device and wear a face mask when appropriate.
Disinfect your device and any affected or nearby surfaces after recording your cough/speech.
If you have an underlying condition where coughing increases your risks  of suffering an illness, please consult your doctor before participating.
If you think your symptoms are getting worse, contact your doctor.

recordCough.title: Instructions
recordCough.intro1: Find a quiet environment that is 20 feet away from those around you.
recordCough.intro2Cough: Wear a surgical or cloth mask and hold your device two hands-length away from your face.
recordCough.intro2Breath: Mantenga el dispositivo a una distancia de 30-60 centímetros de su boca y no obstruya ni cubra el dispositivo con plástico. No respire violentamente o con demasiada fuerza.
recordCough.intro2Speech: Mantenga el dispositivo a una distancia de 30-60 centímetros de su boca y no obstruya ni cubra el dispositivo con plástico. No hable violentamente o con demasiada fuerza.
recordCough.instructions: Para ver un breve tutorial sobre cómo grabar su tos y configurar el micrófono, de clic en el siguiente botón.

recordSpeech.intro1: ¡El sonido de su voz también puede ayudarnos a aprender cómo suena la COVID! Por favor, haga clic para grabar y cuente claramente del uno al diez.

recordingsIntroduction.releaseButtonStart: Haga clic para empezar a grabar
recordingsIntroduction.releaseButtonStop: Haga clic para detener la grabación
recordingsIntroduction.shortRecording: Please make a recording of at least {{seconds}} seconds

recordingsRecord.textCough: Click the record button below and cough intentionally three times with a deep breath between each cough. When you are done, tap the stop button
recordingsRecord.textBreath: Haga clic en el botón de grabación y respira profunda y fuertemente con la boca en la parte inferior del teléfono 3 veces, dejando un espacio entre cada respiración. Cuando haya terminado, toque el botón de detener.
recordingsRecord.textSpeech: Haga clic en el botón de grabación (micrófono), a continuación inhale profundamente y luego diga un 'aaaaah' sostenido durante al menos 5 segundos. Cuando haya terminado, haga clic en el botón de detener
recordingsRecord.textCount: Haga clic en el botón de grabación (el micrófono) y cuente claramente del uno (1) al diez (10). Cuando haya terminado, haga clic en el botón de pausa.

recordingsRecordManual.micError: ¿No puede acceder al micrófono? Suba un archivo de audio (.wav/.wave/.mp3/.ogg)
recordingsRecordManual.micErrorDescription: Por favor, suba un archivo de audio aquí.
recordingsRecordManual.fileDurationTooShort: Por favor, suba un archivo de al menos 3 segundos
recordingsRecordManual.fileSizeTooBig: Por favor, suba un archivo de menos de 5 MB

recordCough.intro1: Busque un entorno tranquilo que esté a 6 metros de los demás
recordCough.intro2: Use un tapabocas quirurgico o de tela y sostenga el dispositivo a 30-60 cm de distancia de su cara

recordSpeech.intro1: ¡El sonido de su voz también puede ayudarnos a aprender cómo suena la COVID! Por favor, haga clic para grabar y cuente claramente del uno (1)  al diez (10).

recordingsListen.title: Check recording
recordingsListen.subtitle: If you wish, you can listen to your recording.

step1.caption2: This can be your home or zip code. Your information will be fully anonymized.

questionary.title: ¡Vamos a responder unas breves preguntas!
questionary.note: Sus respuestas nos ayudarán a crear un algoritmo más preciso y coherente.

beforeSubmit.submitError: Se produjo un error. Por favor, inténtelo de nuevo.

thankyou.title: Thank you for submitting!
thankyou.paragraph1: Your cough donation brings Virufy one step closer to changing the world.
thankyou.paragraph2: Make sure to safeguard this submission ID, as you will need it to request Virufy to delete your anonymized data in the future.<1 /><1 />If you later develop symptoms such as cough, fever, or shortness of breath, please come back to resubmit your latest cough sounds.
